title: SOLD: THX T206 Hallman and Willis Bat
author: rp12367

posts.post_title: SOLD: THX T206 Hallman and Willis Bat
posts.post_content:
FS: T206 Hallman Sweet Caporal 350 SOLD, Willis w/Bat (HOF) Sovereign 350 SOLD Willis card was a PSA 2, PSA dropped the ball on this one, they missed sealed pin hole (lower right corner in border, see scan) and slight nick (lower left edge of border, see scan) still a nice card. I have flip somewhere if I find before sending, I will include with card... Prices include shipping. Perfer paypal gift/no fee... Thanks Ralph
